values.description: Score between 0.0 and +1.0, meaning a patient has on average a 10% chance that her cancer will recur within 10 years without any additional adjuvant treatment, either hormonal therapy or chemotherapy.
Score between -1.0 and 0.0, meaning a patient has a 29% chance that her cancer will recur within 10 years without any additional adjuvant treatment, either hormonal therapy or chemotherapy.
